Home.heroSubtitle: Full Stack Developer | Project Manager | Scrum Master
Home.heroDescription: I am a technology enthusiast. In my daily life, you can find me diving into code, leading teams, or planning sprints. Completely crazy about troubleshooting and continuous learning.
Home.aboutParagraph1: During my free time, I like to venture into Poker tables, online games, or with my cooking skills.
Home.aboutParagraph2: But by far, where I have the most fun, learn, and seek to teach is in my role as a Father, I am completely crazy about my kid.
Home.aboutParagraph3: Whether creating innovative solutions, adventures in my hobbies, or spending quality time with my family, one thing always accompanies me, the passion for everything I do.
Home.aboutParagraph4: Come and discover more about me and my passions!
Home.projectsDescription: Below you can find several of my projects, where I seek to apply specific knowledge, learn something new, or simply have fun.
Home.contactDescription: Did you like any project? Want to know more about me? Or just have a chat? Feel free to contact me!

Projects.title: Guess Number
Projects.description: A game where you have to guess a number between 1 to 100 in X attempts to score in the ranking.

Projects.title: Crack Of Darkness
Projects.description: A text RPG where you must choose your actions to unravel mysteries in a land ravaged by dark evil.

Projects.title: Should I Deploy?
Projects.description: A project inspired ~copied~ by the site https://shouldideploy.today/ but much more Brazilian.

Projects.title: Doc Gen Ext
Projects.description: An extension to generate valid Brazilian documents.
